channel.title: Hi, I'm Sacha from Sidebar and Discover Meteor
channel.description:
My name is Sacha Greif, and I'm currently working on a couple projects, such as [Sidebar][1] (a newsletter of the best design links of the day) and [Discover Meteor][2] (a book about the Meteor JavaScript framework).
I also blog, contribute to open-source projects, and hang around on the internet. Oh, and I live in Osaka, Japan.
[1]: http://sidebar.io [2]: http://discovermeteor.com

item.title: Hi, I'm Sacha from Sidebar and Discover Meteor
item.dc:creator: Sacha
item.description:
@pedrogrande that’s awesome, glad to know there’s Sidebar and Meteor fans around here And yeah, it’s cold in Osaka! I’m wearing a hoodie and a beanie right now. And I’m inside the house…

@ian thanks! Big fan of your podcast here

Read full topic

item.title: Hi, I'm Sacha from Sidebar and Discover Meteor
item.dc:creator: pedrogrande
item.description:
Hi Sasha. I love your Sidebar newsletter. I have it listed as a resource for my students when I teach them the importance of good design. I’m also really keen to get into Meteor so am checking out your book now.

Hope it’s not too cold up there in Osaka right now

Pete

Read full topic
